items.sentence: If it\'s a good day tomorrow, let\'s go to the river to swim.
I can smell Mary\'s perfume. She must have been here earlier.
The police said that Tom may have fallen asleep at the wheel.
There were no passengers on the bus at the time of the crash.
Can you think of anyone who would want to rent my extra room?
I don\'t suppose that there\'s much chance of that happening.
I don\'t want you to think I\'m not happy with your decision.
If I were you, I\'d want to know what Tom is doing right now.
Even though we know smoking is unhealthy, people still smoke.
I thought Tom would eventually realize Mary didn\'t like him.
